column4: I wouldnt know if the Breezy instructions forcefully could work on Dapper, but I'll have to try that on a test box
i thought that card was supported in kernel 2.6.17
it is i believe but it comes up as eth1 but doesnt register any ssid's or work, its dead
have to do this whole setup again and gie it a shot, im just so stable right now on breezy, i got everything workin, cept APM, and i2c, fan sensor support,but BIOS is taking care of that
my Vaio works with the Prism wlan-ng driver
do u know of a good prism usb ethernet adapter that is b/g?  the current one i have is WUSB12 by linksys with Prism driver
nope don't have the $$$ for looking at new hardware
